name: @junctionrelay/plugin-host-windows
description: Host system metrics collector plugin for JunctionRelay (Windows)

scripts.pack: rm -rf out && mkdir -p out/host-windows/dist && cp package.json out/host-windows/ && cp dist/index.js out/host-windows/dist/ && cp -r python out/host-windows/ && cd out && zip -r ../host-windows.zip host-windows && cd .. && rm -rf out
